verses.text: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* be unto the \w pastors|strong="H7462"\w* that \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* and \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* of my \w pasture|strong="H4830"\w*! \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* against the \w pastors|strong="H7462"\w* that \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; Ye have \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w* my \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, and driven them \w away|strong="H5080"\w*, and have not \w visited|strong="H6485"\w* them: behold, I will \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* upon you the \w evil|strong="H7455"\w* of your \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And I will \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of my \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* out of all \w countries|strong="H0776"\w* whither I have \w driven|strong="H5080"\w* them, and will bring them \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to their \w folds|strong="H5116"\w*; and they shall be \w fruitful|strong="H6509"\w* and \w increase|strong="H7235"\w*.

And I will set \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* over them which shall \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* them: and they shall \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* no more, nor be \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w*, neither shall they be \w lacking|strong="H6485"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Behold, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that I will \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w* a \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w Branch|strong="H6780"\w*, and a \w King|strong="H4428"\w* shall \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* and \w prosper|strong="H7919"\w*, and shall \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* and \w justice|strong="H6666"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

In his \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* shall be \w saved|strong="H3467"\w*, and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w safely|strong="H0983"\w*: and this \add is\add* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* whereby he shall be \w called|strong="H7121"\w*, THE \nd LORD\nd* OUR \w RIGHTEOUSNESS|strong="H3072"\w*.\f + \fr 23.6 \ft THE \+nd LORD\+nd*…: Heb. Jehovah-tsidkenu\f*

Therefore, behold, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that they shall no more \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, which brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*;

But, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, which brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* and which \w led|strong="H0935"\w* the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, and from all \w countries|strong="H0776"\w* whither I had \w driven|strong="H5080"\w* them; and they shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in their own \w land|strong="H0127"\w*.

¶ Mine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* me is \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* because of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*; all my \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w shake|strong="H7363"\w*; I am like a \w drunken|strong="H7910"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and like a \w man|strong="H1397"\w* whom \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* hath \w overcome|strong="H5674"\w*, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and because of the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of his \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w*.

For the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* is \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w adulterers|strong="H5003"\w*; for \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of \w swearing|strong="H0423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w mourneth|strong="H0056"\w*; the pleasant \w places|strong="H4999"\w* of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* are dried \w up|strong="H3001"\w*, and their \w course|strong="H4794"\w* is \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and their \w force|strong="H1369"\w* \add is\add* not right.\f + \fr 23.10 \ft swearing: or, cursing\f*\f + \fr 23.10 \ft course: or, violence\f*

For both \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* and \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* are \w profane|strong="H2610"\w*; yea, in my \w house|strong="H1004"\w* have I \w found|strong="H4672"\w* their \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Wherefore their \w way|strong="H1870"\w* shall be unto them as \w slippery|strong="H2519"\w* \add ways\add* in the \w darkness|strong="H0653"\w*: they shall be driven \w on|strong="H1760"\w*, and \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* therein: for I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* upon them, \add even\add* the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of their \w visitation|strong="H6486"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And I have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w folly|strong="H8604"\w* in the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*; they \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* in \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, and caused my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w err|strong="H8582"\w*.\f + \fr 23.13 \ft folly: or, an absurd thing: Heb. unsavoury\f*

I have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* also in the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* an horrible \w thing|strong="H8186"\w*: they commit \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w*, and \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* in \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*: they \w strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* also the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of \w evildoers|strong="H7489"\w*, that \w none|strong="H0376"\w* doth \w return|strong="H7725"\w* from his \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*: they are all of them unto me as \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w*, and the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof as \w Gomorrah|strong="H6017"\w*.\f + \fr 23.14 \ft an…: or, filthiness\f*

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* concerning the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*; Behold, I will \w feed|strong="H0398"\w* them with \w wormwood|strong="H3939"\w*, and make them \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of \w gall|strong="H7219"\w*: for from the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* is \w profaneness|strong="H2613"\w* gone \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* into all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 23.15 \ft profaneness: or, hypocrisy\f*

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w Hearken|strong="H8085"\w* not unto the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* that \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* unto you: they make you \w vain|strong="H1891"\w*: they \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* a \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* of their own \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \add and\add* not out of the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

They \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w still|strong="H0559"\w* unto them that \w despise|strong="H5006"\w* me, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, Ye shall have \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*; and they \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto every one that \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* after the \w imagination|strong="H8307"\w* of his own \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, No \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon you.\f + \fr 23.17 \ft imagination: or, stubbornness\f*

For who hath \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w counsel|strong="H5475"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and hath \w perceived|strong="H7200"\w* and \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* his \w word|strong="H1697"\w*? who hath \w marked|strong="H7181"\w* his \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, and \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add it\add*?\f + \fr 23.18 \ft counsel: or, secret\f*

Behold, a \w whirlwind|strong="H5591"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* is gone \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* in \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*, even a \w grievous|strong="H2342"\w* \w whirlwind|strong="H5591"\w*: it shall fall \w grievously|strong="H2342"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

The \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall not \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, until he have \w executed|strong="H6213"\w*, and till he have \w performed|strong="H6965"\w* the \w thoughts|strong="H4209"\w* of his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: in the \w latter|strong="H0319"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* ye shall \w consider|strong="H0995"\w* it \w perfectly|strong="H0998"\w*.
I have not \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* these \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, yet they \w ran|strong="H7323"\w*: I have not \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* to them, yet they \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w*.

But if they had \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in my \w counsel|strong="H5475"\w*, and had caused my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, then they should have \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* them from their \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and from the \w evil|strong="H7455"\w* of their \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*.

\add Am\add* I a \w God|strong="H0430"\w* at \w hand|strong="H7138"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and not a \w God|strong="H0430"\w* afar \w off|strong="H7350"\w*?

Can \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* himself in secret \w places|strong="H4565"\w* that I shall not \w see|strong="H7200"\w* him? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. Do not I \w fill|strong="H4392"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* what the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, that \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w* in my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w dreamed|strong="H2492"\w*, I have \w dreamed|strong="H2492"\w*.

How long shall \add this\add* \w be|strong="H3426"\w* in the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* that \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*? yea, \add they are\add* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* of the \w deceit|strong="H8649"\w* of their own \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*;

Which \w think|strong="H2803"\w* to cause my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* by their \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w* which they \w tell|strong="H5608"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, as their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* for \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*.

The \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* that hath a \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*, let him \w tell|strong="H5608"\w* a \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*; and he that hath my \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, let him \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* my \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w faithfully|strong="H0571"\w*. What \add is\add* the \w chaff|strong="H8401"\w* to the \w wheat|strong="H1250"\w*? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 23.28 \ft that hath a dream: Heb. with whom is, etc\f*

\add Is\add* not my \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w like|strong="H3541"\w* as a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and like a \w hammer|strong="H6360"\w* \add that\add* \w breaketh|strong="H6327"\w* the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* in \w pieces|strong="H6327"\w*?

Therefore, behold, I \add am\add* against the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that \w steal|strong="H1589"\w* my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* from his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*.

Behold, I \add am\add* against the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that \w use|strong="H3947"\w* their \w tongues|strong="H3956"\w*, and \w say|strong="H5001"\w*, He \w saith|strong="H5002"\w*.\f + \fr 23.31 \ft that…: or, that smooth their tongues\f*

Behold, I \add am\add* against them that \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and do \w tell|strong="H5608"\w* them, and cause my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to \w err|strong="H8582"\w* by their \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*, and by their \w lightness|strong="H6350"\w*; yet I \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* them not, nor \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* them: therefore they shall not \w profit|strong="H3276"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* at \w all|strong="H3276"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

¶ And when this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, or the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, or a \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, shall \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, What \add is\add* the \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*? thou shalt then \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, What \w burden|strong="H4853"\w*? I will even \w forsake|strong="H5203"\w* you, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And \add as for\add* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, and the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, I will even \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* that \w man|strong="H0376"\w* and his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 23.34 \ft punish: Heb. visit upon\f*

Thus shall ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, and every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, What hath the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*? and, What hath the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*?

And the \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall ye \w mention|strong="H2142"\w* no more: for every \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* shall be his \w burden|strong="H4853"\w*; for ye have \w perverted|strong="H2015"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Thus shalt thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, What hath the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* thee? and, What hath the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*?

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* since ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; Because ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w* this \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, The \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and I have \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto you, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye shall not \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*;

Therefore, behold, I, even I, will \w utterly|strong="H5377"\w* \w forget|strong="H5382"\w* you, and I will \w forsake|strong="H5203"\w* you, and the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* that I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* you and your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \add and cast you\add* out of my \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*:

And I will \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* upon you, and a \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w shame|strong="H3640"\w*, which shall not be \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w*.
